data.comment: The match is underway at Akhmat-Arena.
Throw-in for Krasnodar in their own half.
In the minute 1, Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in the half of Krasnodar.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 4, Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 6, Free kick Krasnodar.
In Grozny a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Bernard Berisha of Akhmat Grozny is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 8, Evgeniy Kukulyak awards the home team a throw-in.
Akhmat Grozny have been awarded a corner by Evgeniy Kukulyak.
Georgi Melkadze (Akhmat Grozny) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Krasnodar defenders.
In the minute 9, Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Krasnodar.
Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Grozny, Evgeni Chernov of Krasnodar is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 12, Ball safe as Akhmat Grozny is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Akhmat Grozny apply pressure at Akhmat-Arena and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Vladimir Iljin but the strike hits the bar!
Akhmat Grozny to take a throw-in in Krasnodar territory.
Krasnodar's Evgeni Chernov looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 16, Evgeni Chernov is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Krasnodar have been awarded a corner by Evgeniy Kukulyak.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
Akhmat Grozny's Vladimir Iljin breaks free at Akhmat-Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 22, Evgeniy Kukulyak awards Krasnodar a goal kick.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a Krasnodar throw-in in Akhmat Grozny's half.
Daniil Utkin hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Krasnodar!
In the minute 27, Goal kick for Akhmat Grozny at Akhmat-Arena.
Throw-in Krasnodar.
Throw-in high up the field for Akhmat Grozny in Grozny.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
Krasnodar have a goal kick.
Vladimir Iljin for Akhmat Grozny is whistled offside.
In the minute 31, Ball goes out of play for a Krasnodar goal kick.
In Grozny, Akhmat Grozny push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Krasnodar pushes forward through Daniil Utkin, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 33, Can Akhmat Grozny get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Krasnodar's half?
Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Grozny.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny in the half of Krasnodar.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
In the minute 37, Cristian Ramirez for Krasnodar has been booked by Evgeniy Kukulyak and receives a first yellow card.
Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny close to the penalty box.
Goal kick for Krasnodar at Akhmat-Arena.
In the minute 42, Free kick Akhmat Grozny.
Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
Akhmat Grozny to take a throw-in in Krasnodar territory.
In the minute 44, Evgeniy Kukulyak awards Krasnodar a goal kick.
In Grozny a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Akhmat Grozny have a goal kick.
The first half has been concluded at Akhmat-Arena.
Ismael Silva (Akhmat Grozny) gets booked by Evgeniy Kukulyak, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Akhmat Grozny make their first substitution with Artem Polyarus replacing Evgeny Kharin.
Alexey Ionov for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 48, Krasnodar needs to be cautious. Akhmat Grozny have an attacking throw-in.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a throw-in for Akhmat Grozny, close to Krasnodar's area.
Vladimir Iljin (Akhmat Grozny) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 49, Ball goes out of play for a Krasnodar goal kick.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a Akhmat Grozny throw-in in Krasnodar's half.
Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 51, Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
Free kick Akhmat Grozny.
Vyacheslav Litvinov (Krasnodar) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 53, Akhmat Grozny push forward at Akhmat-Arena and Wilker Angel Romero gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Krasnodar defence.
Akhmat Grozny have been awarded a corner by Evgeniy Kukulyak.
Zoran Nizic of Akhmat Grozny smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 54, Can Akhmat Grozny capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
At Akhmat-Arena, Kaio Pantaleao has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Artem Polyarus gets his shot on target but fails to score for Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 56, Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
Murad Olegovich Musaev is making the team's first substitution at Akhmat-Arena with Shapi Suleymanov replacing Eduard Spertsyan.
In the minute 57, Akhmat Grozny awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Grozny Krasnodar attack through Shapi Suleymanov. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 58, Evgeniy Kukulyak awards Akhmat Grozny a goal kick.
Can Akhmat Grozny get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Krasnodar's half?
Georgi Melkadze for Akhmat Grozny gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 59, Ball goes out of play for a Krasnodar goal kick.
Akhmat Grozny have a goal kick.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Akhmat Grozny in the half of Krasnodar.
Can Akhmat Grozny capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Krasnodar's half?
Goal kick for Krasnodar at Akhmat-Arena.
In the minute 63, Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
Krasnodar's Maksim Kutovoy is whistled for offside at Akhmat-Arena.
Murad Olegovich Musaev (Krasnodar) is making a second substitution, with Maksim Kutovoy replacing Marcus Berg.
In the minute 65, Akhmat Grozny have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Akhmat Grozny.
Wilker Angel Romero is on target to give Akhmat Grozny a 1-0 advantage.
Bernard Berisha for Akhmat Grozny drives towards goal at Akhmat-Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 68, Lechii Sadulaev is replacing Georgi Melkadze for Akhmat Grozny at Akhmat-Arena.
Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 70, Important block from the Akhmat Grozny defence as Shapi Suleymanov fires in a strike for Krasnodar.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Krasnodar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 72, Krasnodar's Shapi Suleymanov gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Grozny.
Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
In the minute 73, Krasnodar's Yuri Gazinskiy has been booked in Grozny.
Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Krasnodar push forward at Akhmat-Arena and Daniil Utkin gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Akhmat Grozny defence.
In the minute 76, Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
The home team replace Vladimir Iljin with Anton Shvets.
Marat Bystrov is replacing Bernard Berisha for the home team.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Krasnodar at Akhmat-Arena.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Krasnodar in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
The away team have replaced Cristian Ramirez with Leon Sabua. This is the third substitution made today by Murad Olegovich Musaev.
Ruslan Kambolov is on a sub for Yuri Gazinskiy for Krasnodar.
Ruslan Kambolov of Krasnodar gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Akhmat Grozny goal kick.
In the minute 82, Goal! Ismael Silva extends Akhmat Grozny's lead to 2-0.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a Akhmat Grozny throw-in in Krasnodar's half.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Krasnodar.
In the minute 85, Free kick for Akhmat Grozny in their own half.
Evgeniy Kukulyak awards Krasnodar a goal kick.
Throw-in for Krasnodar in the half of Akhmat Grozny.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Krasnodar close to the penalty box.
Krasnodar drives forward and Shapi Suleymanov gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Grozny.
In the minute 88, In Grozny a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Zoran Nizic is booked for the home team.
Throw-in high up the field for Krasnodar in Grozny.
Krasnodar will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Akhmat Grozny.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Krasnodar's Leon Sabua gets in a shot on goal at Akhmat-Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Krasnodar in their own half.
Evgeniy Kukulyak signals a free kick to Akhmat Grozny just outside Krasnodar's area.
Artem Polyarus hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Grozny for Akhmat Grozny.
Evgeniy Kukulyak blows to end the match. The final score is 2-0.
Andrey Talalaev (Akhmat Grozny) is making a fifth substitution, with Oleg Ivanov replacing Ismael Silva.
Ruslan Kambolov (Krasnodar) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
